hero.title: A library of dependency-free React hooks
hero.description: Raddix is a collection of modern, server-safe, typescript-written, zero-dependency React hooks that do one thing.

features.title: Type-Safe
features.description: All hooks are written in typescript, and full typescript support.

features.title: Zero-dependency
features.description: All hooks are easy to use, just import and use it.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Raddix is a lightweight library, ensuring that your application does not become heavy.

features.title: Fully tested
features.description: All hooks are fully tested, and 100% test coverage.

features.title: Server-Safe
features.description: All hooks are server-safe, no window or document object used.
